subject: Dynamically adding test classes at test-time
msgSnippet: After doing a fair amount of research, I just can t seem to find a viable way to test classes that are loaded during test-time. For example, my use case is
messageBody:
After doing a fair amount of research, I just can't seem to find a viable way to test classes that are loaded during test-time. For example, my use case is launching some tests from an Eclipse plugin test for code-generated classes.

This situation is actually more difficult under JUnit4 because of reliance on annotations. I can't find a path that doesn't require class names to exist at compile time. Am I missing something?
